summary: Pivot away from the existing "wheel" concept/mechanic and replace it with a new, simple, popular-feeling, easy-to-use but addictive concept that is "not out yet" (i.e., an original new idea).

existing_features.title: Remove the wheel-based navigation mechanic from the app, including its UI, hooks, and styling, so no wheel navigation is rendered or referenced anywhere in the reel experience.
Implement a new simple, popular-feeling navigation mechanic (not a wheel) that is consistently available in the reel-first experience and is easy to use on mobile and desktop.
Update the reel page and any related layout logic so the new navigation mechanic replaces the wheel without introducing duplicate/confusing navigation patterns.

Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme across the new navigation and reel experience that feels modern and addictive while staying simple (avoid blue/purple as the primary identity unless already present).

new_feature_requests.summary: Delete/remove the current wheel-based concept/mechanic and replace it with a new simple, easy-to-use, addictive (original) concept that feels popular but is not an existing released product.

projectName: Remove wheel navigation and replace with a simpler new navigation mechanic
